overview:
Trey has been the CEO of dotMobi since 2007. Dublin-based dotMobi enables the development & discovery of mobile Web content, and Trey transitioned from single product domain company to software/data business with Fortune 1000 and SMB customers in 130+ countries. Worked closely with board from Ericsson, Google, GSM Association, Huchison Whampoa/3, Microsoft, Nokia, Orascom Telecom, Samsung Electronics, Syniverse, T-Mobile, TelefÃ³nica MÃ³viles, Telecom Italia Mobile (TIM), Visa and Vodafone.

Prior to dotMobi, was employee #2 and CFO of UgMo (wireless environmental monitoring systems) after running business operations at VeriSign’s Internet infrastructure division. Trey was also a former VP-Product Development at Network Solutions, ran an internal venture group at VeriSign, and was Chief of Staff at Network Solutions. Trey started as a banker with SunTrust Bank in the US before grad school.

Mr. Harvin holds an MBA in Entrepreneurship & Finance from Georgetown University as well as a BA from the College of Charleston. He has also completed post-graduate international business studies at the University of Oxford.
